abstract_summ: The aim of our study was to assess the psychological impact of COVID-19 pandemic on young French urologists in training.Objectives: To evaluate the COVID-19 impact on dermatologic surgery outpatient management.We provide a practical strategy to reorganize pathways of emergency and elective colorectal surgery during the COVID-19 pandemic.Background: The COVID-19 pandemic is challenging healthcare systems worldwide.Conclusion: COVID19 pandemic has a negative impact on young French urologists in training and on their work and training quality.
title_summ: The impact of COVID-19 pandemics on dermatologic surgery: real-life data from the Italian Red-Zone.Coronavirus pandemic and Colorectal surgery: practical advice based on the Italian experience.COVID19 pandemic impact on anxiety of French urologists in training: outcomes from a national survey
title_abstract_phrases: Objectives: To evaluate the COVID-19 impact on dermatologic surgery outpatient management.The aim of our study was to assess the psychological impact of COVID-19 pandemic on young French urologists in training.The impact of COVID-19 pandemics on dermatologic surgery: real-life data from the Italian Red-Zone.We provide a practical strategy to reorganize pathways of emergency and elective colorectal surgery during the COVID-19 pandemic.Conclusion: COVID19 pandemic has a negative impact on young French urologists in training and on their work and training quality.
